newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austria '96 public budget deficit 4.0-4.1 pct GDP.
newsitem.headline: Austria '96 public budget deficit 4.0-4.1 pct GDP.

text.p: Austrian Finance Minister Viktor Klima said on Friday Austria's public budget deficit fell to around 4.0-4.1 percent of GDP in 1996 from 6.2 percent the previous year while public debt came in below 70 percent.
"The deficit for the state, provinces and communities was around 4.0-4.1 percent of GDP. For the first time in five years we have reached the planned budget deficit," Klima told a news conference.
"Public debt will not exceed 70 percent of GDP," he continued, adding that he expected the public debt ratio to decline towards 65 percent this year. -- Vienna Newsroom, 43-1-53112-258
